com.supersimplestocks.business

Class StockTradeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.supersimplestocks.business.StockTradeUtil

  • public class StockTradeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that executes business operations (buy, sell) on the stock exchange and retrieves information about the stocks such as dividend yield, P/E ratio, Volume Weighted Stock Price for a given stock based on trades in the 5 minutes and All Share Index.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      Returns the dividend yield for a stock based on a given price.
      double getGBCEAllShareIndex()
      Calculates the GBCE All Share Index using the geometric mean of the Volume Weighted Stock Price for all stocks.

      Returns the price/earnings ratio for a stock based on a given price.

                       int price,

        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - - the stock to be traded
        quantity - - the quantity of shares that were traded
        price - - the price at which the stock was traded

      • getGBCEAllShareIndex

        public double getGBCEAllShareIndex()
                            throws BusinessException
        Calculates the GBCE All Share Index using the geometric mean of the Volume Weighted Stock Price for all stocks. It also validates the input parameters; if the validation fails, a BusinessException is thrown.
        Returns:
        the GBCE All Share Index
        Throws:
        BusinessException
